sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_9597df8293fa4210dcc7bc2efaba10d3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="New travel request">160c47c293ba4210dcc7bc2efaba1016</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7f20df0a93ba4210dcc7bc2efaba107c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Show/hide company event</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }

    console.log("newValue:", newValue);
    console.log("Type of newValue:", typeof newValue);

    if (newValue === 'Yes') {
        console.log("Setting company_event to visible and mandatory.");
        g_form.setDisplay('company_event', true);
        g_form.setMandatory('company_event', true);
        g_form.showFieldMsg('company_event', 'Event company is required', 'info');
    } else if (newValue === 'No') {
        console.log("Clearing and hiding company_event.");
        g_form.setMandatory('company_event', false); // Make it non-mandatory first
        g_form.setValue('company_event', ''); // Clear the field value
        g_form.hideFieldMsg('company_event'); // Clear any field messages
        g_form.setDisplay('company_event', false); // Hide the field last
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-16 18:12:26</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9597df8293fa4210dcc7bc2efaba10d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show/hide company event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Travel" source="x_31018_travel">364aac1893bf7110dcc7bc2efaba105f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Travel">364aac1893bf7110dcc7bc2efaba105f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9597df8293fa4210dcc7bc2efaba10d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-16 18:39:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
